refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the default for defaultlabel on QandASet.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: If no defaultlabel attribute is specified on a qandaset, this value is used. It must be one of the legal values for the defaultlabel attribute, one from none, number or qanda. The default value is 'number'.
qanda - questions are labeled “Q:” and answers are labeled “A:”.
none - No distinguishing label precedes Questions or Answers.
